entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
